WorkItem.Description:
The title is required in MessageDialog class. Otherwise it's not displayed.

Need to update CreateDialog method in GalaSoft.MvvmLight/GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Platform (WIN81)/Views/DialogService.cs:

```
var dialog = new MessageDialog(message, title ?? "");
```
WorkItem.Summary: DialogService (UWP) does not set empty title

Comments.Message:
Also methods ShowMessage and ShowError allow to skip buttonText param:

> The text shown in the only button in the dialog box. If left null, the text "OK" will be used

Default value does not work. The dialog is not shown, if you pass null to buttonText param.
